title: Binatone Highlights Expanded Line of Motorola Baby Monitors at 2015 ABC Kids Expo
text:
Binatone Highlights Expanded Line of Motorola Baby Monitors at 2015 ABC Kids Expo The line includes current award-winning models and will feature recently launched products as well as the unveiling of new and innovative monitors. October 18, 2015 10:37   
LAS VEGAS- At the ABC Kids Expo (All Baby & Child), which kicks off today in Las Vegas, Binatone, the official licensee of Motorola Baby Monitors, will be showcasing their expanded line of baby monitors. The show will be used as a platform to unveil new, innovative products and also highlight their current award-winning models. 
Over the last year, Binatone Global and Hubble have teamed up to launch Motorola’s extensive line of Wi-Fi® Capable Baby Monitors. Hubble, the largest connected provider of video cloud services, and Binatone Global’s partnership further positions Motorola as the world's leader in connected products. 
At the show, Binatone will highlight the recently revamped MBP36, their most successful monitor of all time. The upgraded model, now called the Motorola MBP853CONNECT, received an aesthetic facelift and includes Wi-Fi capabilities in addition to all of the existing features of the beloved product. The MBP853CONNECT will join the existing MBP854CONNECT in Motorola’s broad line of Wi-Fi® Capable Baby Monitors. Show-goers will also get a sneak peek at the new MBP877CONNECT, which will hit the baby monitor market in the coming months. 
“We are looking forward to showcasing our monitors as well as debuting the soon-to-be released MBP877CONNECT,” says Jason Richarz, Vice President of Sales for Binatone. “These new monitors are incredible additions to our line of products and will continue to provide parents with technology that delivers peace of mind.” 
Throughout the week at ABC, Motorola will be enlisting the expertise of renowned parenting and lifestyle digital influencers Audrey McClelland and Vera Sweeney. Using social media strategies and their reach in the category, Vera and Audrey will give parents an insider’s look at the newest technology from Binatone. 
Motorola Baby Monitors can be found online and at major retailers across the United States. 
About Binatone: 
Binatone is a leading provider of innovative consumer electronics and lifestyle products for a broad range of applications including baby nursery, pet nursery and family connectivity at home. Its products are sold under world leading brands such as Motorola, AEG, Binatone and iDECT. For over 56 years, Binatone maintains its position as a key player in the consumer electronics industry by offering innovative products and solutions. 
For more information, visit www.binatoneglobal.com 
About Hubble Connected: 
Hubble Connected Limited (‘Hubble’) is a global Internet of Things (IoT) Solutions and Platform-as-a-Service (PaaS) provider with offices in USA, Canada, UK, India, Hong Kong and Vietnam. The Hubble platform enables operators and service providers to enhance their offerings and leading global original equipment manufacturers (OEM) to deliver fully integrated connected propositions with rich applications that include live video streaming, Cloud recording and GPS tracking. Hubble has an industry leading ability to offer affordable full global Cellular connectivity. As well as directly connecting a host of leading global brands such as Motorola, Binatone, AEG and Beurer, Hubble is a member of the AllSeen Alliance and Thread Group; making products interoperable with other major brands, such as Electrolux, LG, Nest and Samsung. 
For more information, visit www.hubbleconnected.com 
About Motorola 
Motorola exists to invent, build and deliver the best mobile devices on the planet, improving the lives of millions of people. Motorola baby monitors are one of the best-selling brands across Europe and the US. The brand prides itself on innovation and quality. 
For more information, visit www.motorola.com Contacts
